name: BUMS
description:
- The whole point of the game is to collect the entire collection of tapes hidden throughout the map and complete them.


- Look for hidden tapes and play them on your TV with a set-top box. When you start the mini-game on the TV, you can split into teams and even play alone against everyone to show your superiority. Each cassette contains a unique mini-game that can be played with or without friends. Each mini-game may change the mechanics of the game, so there is no core mechanic.


- You appear in an open world, where we recommend inviting your friends. Explore locations in search of tapes that can be hidden anywhere. Each cassette contains a unique mini-game, which depends on its location.
"There are unique tapes that only a select few will find."
- The tapes you find can be played on the TV set-top box to start a mini-game. All mini-games can be completed with your friends.
